EmailTemplate.subject: Drawing Tomorrow: Win A Phantom 2 Vision Plus RC Drone With VMTurbo 5.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=}}, Drawing #2 is Tomorrow...
Aric F. Won the First Phantom Drone. Are You Next? Download Today for Your Chance. <http://www.vmturbo.com/35000-decisions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=121814> {{lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}}, VMTurbo 5.0 <http://vmturbo.com/blog/vmturbo-release-5?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000decisions&utm_content=112114> was the biggest release since the company's founding in 2009. Version 5.0 extends control to Network, VDI, Hybrid Cloud, Applications, and Docker Containers. Yes, Containers.
With 5.0, you will receive continuous recommendations on which workloads to run where, when, and under what configurations, to continually maximize performance and utilization across your infrastructure.
As a celebration of the complete control VMTurbo offers IT admins, architects, and engineers, we've given away 1 Phantom 2 Vision+ RC Drone every month until our next release. Click below to learn more on how to win. Win The Phantom <http://vmturbo.com/35000-decisions?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=35000-decisions&utm_content=121814> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
